interpretation: The "rat" card represents resourcefulness, cunning, and adaptability. Just like a rat can survive in almost any environment, this card encourages you to be resourceful and make the best of any situation. You may need to use your wits and intelligence to overcome challenges and obstacles. However, be careful not to be too sneaky or deceitful in your actions. The rat also symbolizes fertility and abundance, indicating that you may be in a period of growth and prosperity. Trust your instincts and use your natural abilities to succeed. In relationships, the rat may represent a partner who is clever and quick-witted, but also unpredictable. Overall, the "rat" card urges you to be flexible, adaptable, and resourceful in your approach to life.
